testcase.classname: To verify the login functionality of application
testcase.name: Check the user login with Valid user
testcase.system-out: Given User is on actitime login page........................................passed When User Enters username as admin in the username field....................passed And user enters password as manaager in the password field..................passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then User should get page title as actiTime - Enter Time-Track..............passed And close the actiTime browser..............................................passed

testcase.classname: To verify the login functionality of application
testcase.name: Check the user login with invalid user
testcase.system-out: Given User is on actitime login page........................................passed When User Enters username as admin in the username field....................passed And user enters password as "" in the password field........................passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then User should get page title as actiTime - Login.........................passed And close the actiTime browser..............................................passed

testcase.classname: To verify the login functionality of application
testcase.name: Check the user login with invalid user 2
testcase.system-out: Given User is on actitime login page........................................passed When User Enters username as "" in the username field.......................passed And user enters password as manager in the password field...................passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then User should get page title as actiTime - Login.........................passed And close the actiTime browser..............................................passed
